# SludgeVS - Born to consume content, forced to code

SludgeVS is a Visual Studio Code extension designed to provide stimulating content to users that get bored while they code.

## ğŸŒŸ Features

SludgeVS offers a simple, fun feature to help users who need stimulation while coding:

- Watch a stimulating video by activating the "HELP ME" command.

![Activate HELP ME command](https://i.imgur.com/J8jsh1Q.png)

## ğŸ¬ Videos

SludgeVS offers a selection of videos to keep you entertained during your breaks:

1. Minecraft Parkour
2. GTA V Stunts
3. Subway Surfers
4. ASMR

## ğŸš€ Usage

1. Press `Ctrl+Shift+P` to open the command palette.
2. Type "HELP ME" and select the command from the list.
3. Lock your brain into the project you're working on by consuming content at the same time

## ğŸ”§ Requirements

There are no special requirements or dependencies for this extension.

## âš™ï¸ Extension Settings

There are currently no configurable settings for this extension.

No known issues at this time.
